com.barrybecker4.common.app
Class CommandLineOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.barrybecker4.common.app.CommandLineOptions

public class CommandLineOptions
extends java.lang.Object

A convenient packaging of command line options that are specified for a program when you run it from the command line.

Constructor Detail

CommandLineOptions

public CommandLineOptions(java.lang.String[] args)
Constructor. Parse out the args and put them in a hashmap. We expect the args to be some set of flags of the form - followed by and optional value So an example argument list might be java someProgram -p 3434 -type pente -locale en -verbose -safe -title "my title" Note: verbose and -safe are options and do not have values.

Parameters:
args - an array of command line arguments. May be empty, but not null.
